channel.title: The Gauntlet Podcast: Apocalypse World - Burned Over, Bat Hack, Legacy: Life Among the Ruins
channel.description: On the new episode of the podcast @RichRogers, Rach Shelkey, and @MadJayZero discuss several Hangouts/GauntletCon games as well as Mad Jay's Kickstarted living campaign, *Into the Madlands*. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/apocalypse-world-burned-over-bat-hack-legacy-life-among-the-ruins

item.title: The Gauntlet Podcast: Apocalypse World - Burned Over, Bat Hack, Legacy: Life Among the Ruins
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the new episode of the podcast @RichRogers, Rach Shelkey, and @MadJayZero discuss several Hangouts/GauntletCon games as well as Mad Jay’s Kickstarted living campaign, Into the Madlands.

THE GAUNTLET

Apocalypse World - Burned Over, Bat Hack, Legacy: Life Among the Ruins

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss
